overview:
Jeff joined Clikthrough help build a complex video solution. He currently leads the architecture and development of technology platform for video search and interactivity. Using his broad knowledge of web technologies, user interaction design principals and management skills, he strives to make Clikthrough the premier source for interactive videos and allow people to get more out of their video viewing experience.

Jeffrey Beaman is the Chief Technical Officer of Clikthrough Inc. Mr. Beaman previously served over two years as a senior enterprise consultant for Backbase, an international AJAX framework professional services company, where he serviced Global 2000 clients and conducted numerous AJAX training courses worldwide. At Backbase, Mr. Beaman started as manager of US consulting and training, providing guidance and structure to the domestic sales and worldwide marketing teams. Mr. Beaman brings over 11 years of hands on development experience, with a comprehensive knowledge of the technical and business aspects of product development. In addition, Mr. Beaman has significant experience in architecting both modern web application architectures and fault tolerant client-server applications. Mr. Beaman holds a B.S. in Cognitive Science: Human Computer Interaction, and minor in Management Science (Economics) from the University of California, San Diego. (UCSD)

degrees.subject: Cognitive Science: Human Computer Interaction / Artificial Intelligence
